name: date-formatter
author: Likhith K.P.
description: A simple and easy-to-use npm package for formatting JavaScript `Date` objects into multiple human-readable formats. It leverages the powerful `dayjs` library to provide developers with a variety of date formatting options. Whether you need a date in the `dd-mm-yyyy` format, or a more complex format like `Sep 20, 2018 10:45:33 PM`, this utility has you covered with several common and customizable formats.
